headline: Kroger Rewards Shareholders With 9% Increase in Quarterly Dividend
summary: KR hikes its quarterly dividend by 9%, marking 19 straight years of increases as free cash flow stays strong.

headline: ‘Please don’t abandon us’: Kroger store closures spark outcry from workers and shoppers at doomed locations
summary: As the grocery chain plans to shutter 60 stores for “modest financial benefit,” local communities are raising concerns about food access and the loss of jobs.

raw.headline: ‘Please don’t abandon us’: Kroger store closures spark outcry from workers and shoppers at doomed locations

headline: Seed Oil Free Certified Partners With RangeMe to Accelerate Growing Demand
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., June 27, 2025--The Seed Oil Free Alliance announced today that Seed Oil Free Certified™ is now a searchable attribute on RangeMe, the industry-leading product discovery platform used by Walmart, Kroger, Sprouts, Thrive Market, and other major national and regional retailers. This new feature enables retail buyers to easily identify and filter products that are Seed Oil Free Certified, aligning with a growing wave of consumer demand for transparently labelled, heat-stable, and s
